# Class VADFactory

Factory class for creating VAD (Voice Activity Detection) instances. Provides methods to create voice activity detection models.

##### Index

### Methods

createLocal

## Methods

### `Static`createLocal

  * createLocal(config: [LocalVADConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_vad_config.LocalVADConfigInterface)): Promise<[VAD](./primitives_vad_vad.VAD)>

Creates a local VAD instance.

#### Parameters

    * config: [LocalVADConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_vad_config.LocalVADConfigInterface)

Configuration for the local VAD

#### Returns Promise<[VAD](./primitives_vad_vad.VAD)>

Promise resolving to a new VAD instance
